name: MTLTextureUsage
desc: An enumeration for the various options that determine how you can use a texture.

items.name: static var unknown: MTLTextureUsage
items.desc: An option for a texture whose usage is unknown.

items.name: static var shaderRead: MTLTextureUsage
items.desc: An option for reading or sampling from the texture in a shader.

items.name: static var shaderWrite: MTLTextureUsage
items.desc: An option for writing to the texture in a shader.

items.name: static var renderTarget: MTLTextureUsage
items.desc: An option for rendering to the texture in a render pass.

items.name: static var pixelFormatView: MTLTextureUsage
items.desc: An option to create texture views with a different component layout.
